title: Add --project filter to tk next
description:
Add --project filter flag to next command in cmd/next.go.

Implementation:
- Add --project string flag
- When --project specified without epic: find next task across all epics matching project
- When --project specified with epic: find next task in epic matching project
- Combine with existing next logic (priority, blockers)

Test cases:
- Next with project finds next matching task
- Next with project and epic ID
- Next excludes non-matching projects
acceptance_criteria: Filter works, combines with next logic, tests pass
